title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Social Problem-Solving Capabilities Through Online Challenge-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Social Issues and Experience with Online Collaboration Tools
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can operationalize challenge-based learning strategies to analyze social issues.
Learners can effectively perform tasks in teams of five or more members using online collaboration tools.
Learners can improve challenge-solving approaches by at least 80% based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
